revised_title: Polarization Phenomena in Crystals: The Study of Rings Produced by Circularly Polarized Light
tldr: This article discusses the study of rings produced by crystals when exposed to circularly polarized light. The author explains the optical arrangements and phenomena resulting from the use of polarizers, analyzers, and crystal plates. The author also describes a method to distinguish between positive and negative crystals based on the distortion of the rings.
